table.name: vtiger_hotelprices
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hotelprices` ( `hotelpricesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `hotelpricesno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `date_in` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_out` date DEFAULT NULL, `dz_price` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `ezz_price` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `rooms` int(7) DEFAULT NULL, `cf_1476` int(7) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hotelpricesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hotelpricescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hotelpricescf` ( `hotelpricesid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hotelpricesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
